APP.TITLE: Runner Toolkit
APP.DESCRIPTION: Professional running tools for race planning, performance tracking, and unit conversions.

RACE.TITLE: Race Tools
RACE.FINISH_TIME_PREDICTOR_DESC: Predict race finish times based on current performance
RACE.PACE_CALCULATOR_DESC: Calculate pace from distance and time

PERSONAL.TITLE: Personal Tools
PERSONAL.CALORIES_BURNED_CALCULATOR_DESC: Calculate calories burned during your runs
PERSONAL.BMI_CALCULATOR_DESC: Calculate your BMI and estimate body fat using advanced methods

TRAINING.TITLE: Training
TRAINING.TRAINING_PACES_CALCULATOR_DESC: Get personalized training paces based on your recent run

UNITS.TITLE: Unit Converters
UNITS.PACE_SPEED_CONVERTER_DESC: Convert between pace and speed units

HOME.QUICK_START_SUBTITLE: Jump right into our most popular tools
HOME.QUICK_START_PACE_DESC: Calculate your running pace from distance and time
HOME.QUICK_START_BMI_DESC: Calculate BMI and body composition analysis
HOME.QUICK_START_TRAINING_DESC: Get personalized training paces for optimal performance
HOME.ALL_TOOLS_SUBTITLE: Comprehensive suite of running calculators and converters
HOME.SUB_DESCRIPTION: Whether you're training for your first 5K or your next marathon, our calculators will help you
HOME.SUB_DESCRIPTION_2: run faster, train smarter, and reach your goals.
HOME.FAST_ACCURATE_DESC: Get instant, precise calculations for all your running metrics.
HOME.MOBILE_FRIENDLY_DESC: Works perfectly on all devices - phone, tablet, or desktop.
HOME.FREE_DESC: No subscriptions, no ads, no hidden costs - just pure functionality.
HOME.OFFLINE_DESC: No internet connection required - calculate anytime, anywhere.
HOME.CUSTOMIZABLE_DESC: Choose your preferred units and settings for a personalized experience.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for any questions or assistance
contact.copy_failed: Failed to copy email. Please copy manually.
contact.response_info: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 7 business days. For urgent technical issues, please include detailed steps to reproduce the problem.

footer.description: Empowering runners worldwide with precise, science-based tools. Our mission is to help every athlete train smarter and achieve their personal best.
footer.languages_supported: We handle communication in English and Polish

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and provide our services.

essential.name: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic app functionality and user preferences

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our app (Firebase Analytics)

advertising.name: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: Used to serve relevant ads (Google AdSense)

data_retention.title: Data Retention
data_retention.content: We retain your information for different periods depending on the type of data and its purpose:

items.analytics: Analytics data (Firebase): Automatically deleted after 26 months (Google's default retention period)
items.local_storage: Local storage data: Retained until you clear your browser data, uninstall the app, or manually delete it
items.advertising: Advertising cookies: Typically expire after 30 days to 2 years depending on the specific cookie

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

cookie_consent.title: We Use Cookies
cookie_consent.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site usage, and provide personalized advertisements. You can customize your preferences or accept all cookies.
cookie_consent.description_returning: Thank you for using Runner Toolkit! We're asking again about cookies to ensure you have the best experience. Your support helps us keep this app free and continuously improve our tools for runners worldwide.
cookie_consent.privacy_policy_link: Learn more in our Privacy Policy

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic website functionality, user preferences, and security. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our app through Firebase Analytics. Used to improve performance and user experience.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: Used by Google AdSense to show relevant advertisements and measure ad effectiveness. May track you across websites.

help_us.title: Help us keep Runner Toolkit free!
help_us.description: This app is completely free thanks to ads and analytics. Your acceptance helps us improve features and develop new tools for runners worldwide.

no_consent.title: Ads Disabled
no_consent.description: You haven't consented to advertising cookies. Please enable them to help keep Runner Toolkit free and support our development.

ad_blocker.title: Ad Blocker Detected
ad_blocker.description: Help us keep Runner Toolkit free by allowing ads. Your support enables us to maintain and improve these tools for the running community.
ad_blocker.request: Please disable your ad blocker on our site.
